title: Konami Denies Kojima Has Left Company, Says He Is On Vacation
text:
Konami Denies Kojima Has Left Company, Says He Is On Vacation 
Published By: Gamerant.com - Today 
In a bizarre turn of events, Konami claims Kojima is still an employee at the company and is taking an extended vacation due to a long devel...
